EmailTemplate.description: It will be used to send a Second Notice email to Medical Professional for reviewing Diagnosis Verification Form.
EmailTemplate.name: Diagnosis Verification Reminder Form Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Second Notice: Diagnosis Verification Signature Not Captured
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Treating_Medical_Professional_First_Name__c},
Please Review the Diagnosis Verification and submit.
Password : {!Lead.00N2f000000ojKq}
Thanks Make A Wish America
